items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by allowing you to add a customizable highlight bar overlay to any webpage. This extension helps users stay focused on specific sections of content while scrolling through a page.

items.content_html: custom-categorize is a lightweight library designed to help you categorize data based on custom filtering logic. Built with flexibility in mind, the library offers: Default filtering: Use built-in logic for common grouping scenarios. Custom filtering: Pass your own filter function to tailor the categorization process to your data.
items.title: Cabraham1/custom-categorize: custom-categorize is a lightweight library designed to help you categorize data based on custom filtering logic. Built with flexibility in mind, the library offers:  Default filtering: Use built-in logic for common grouping scenarios. Custom filtering: Pass your own filter function to tailor the categorization process to your data.

items.content_html: small-i18n is a lightweight internationalization package that offers a simple and efficient way to manage translations in your project. It allows you to translate text using keys, without the additional overhead and complexity found in full-fledged i18n libraries.
items.title: MsudMthr/i18n-light: small-i18n is a lightweight internationalization package that offers a simple and efficient way to manage translations in your project. It allows you to translate text using keys, without the additional overhead and complexity found in full-fledged i18n libraries.

items.content_html: GradientEditor.js is a lightweight JavaScript plugin designed to provide an intuitive UI for creating and managing CSS gradients. It supports multiple gradient color stops, directional adjustments, and pre-defined gradient templates.
